dr.evomodel.speciation
Class UltrametricSpeciationModel

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.model.AbstractModel
      dr.evomodel.speciation.SpeciationModel
          dr.evomodel.speciation.UltrametricSpeciationModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Units, Model, ModelListener, StatisticList, VariableListener, MPISerializable, Identifiable, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BirthDeathGernhard08Model, RandomLocalYuleModel
public abstract class UltrametricSpeciationModel
extends SpeciationModel
implements Units

This interface provides methods that describe a speciation model.

Author:
Andrew Rambaut, Alexei Drummond
See Also:

Method Detail

logTreeProbability

public abstract double logTreeProbability(int taxonCount)
"fixed" part of likelihood. Guaranteed to be called before any logNodeProbability calls for one evaluation of the tree.

Parameters:
taxonCount - Number of taxa in tree
Returns:
density factor which is not node dependent
